docs.text:
About this book


ErlangBook is an attempt to write a beginner friendly book about 
Erlang
 , which I write to better memorize things myself, because I heard that writing about something is the best way to learn and memorize something better.


You can find the source code for this book at GitHub:

ErlangBook
 /

source
